page.title: 02Trench Hall School
page.content: Trench Hall School is a school for {maladjusted}children, run by the local authority. There are{25 children}at the school aged between 6 and 13, 22 being boarders and 3 day pupils. There are 3 full-time and 1 part-time teachers and a head mistress. General subjects are taught in a similar manner to a primary school. There are 9 domestic staff, 1 secretary, 1 caretaker and 3 full-time and 1 part-time houseparents. The day children are brought to school and taken home by W.R.V.S. drivers. Trench Hall School is situated in large grounds whilst the caretaker lives in a bungalow on the premises.
